author: Staff Reporter
text:
Thirteen unauthorised dyeing units that were functioning in Pallipalayam and Komarapalayam were sealed by officials of Tamil Nadu Pollution Control Board here on Monday.

The officials found six units in Pallipalayam and seven units in Komarapalayam functioning without permission. Also, six units that obtained permission, but were letting effluents into river without process were also sealed by the officials.
title: Unauthorised dyeing units sealed
